attributes.action: Abolish all plans to remove the symbol of Britannia from the 50p piece
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How outrageous to think of removing Britannia from our coin..............the symbol of pride and unity

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
